name: Ball Butchery
description:
Ball Butchery is a tough one button 2D platformer. You play as a cute ball in a giant butchery with evil chain saws and machines. 

So far only 3 levels exist. This is because we developed this game during one week for a class  in our master course "Game Development & Research". 

We had a couple of restrictions: 

1. Generate a Color Palette at https://coolors.co/
2. You may only use 3 colors from that palette
3. Your game must be controlled by only one button

Controlls:

A on Controller or Space on Keyboard: Jump and everything else.
